title: REAR PARK ASSIST^

items.title: REAR PARK ASSIST^
items.description: Squeeze into the smallest spaces without a scrape with these neatly integrated rear parking sensors. Small and colour-matched to your car’s paintwork, they warn you with a beep when you get too close to another vehicle or object.

disclaimer:
